plot: Torgeir is a simple and a lonely soul. To release himself from the loneliness, he decides to pick up a blind hitchhiker.
title: Haikeren
plot_es: Torgeir is a simple and a lonely soul. To release himself from the loneliness, he decides to pick up a blind hitchhiker.
